title: Fanfiction Contest
body:
The lamp post hit the floor.
{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Man I understand what you were going for with this, but it feels so unfair to try and stretch for something so short just to stand out. I know you had a really great idea, I'd love to see it expanded upon sometime!

> [{quoted}](name=HierosGodhead,realm=OCE,application-id=wJE2nAgV,discussion-id=XkjWUYt1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-26T03:43:00.118+0000)
>
> Man I understand what you were going for with this, but it feels so unfair to try and stretch for something so short just to stand out. I know you had a really great idea, I'd love to see it expanded upon sometime!

Thanks, I might write a short story of it when I have spare time, and yea, this isn't a serious entry
